Description.div: This table stores the Server Information associated with the Services. ServerKey is a foreign key in YFS_SUB_FLOW table. When the IntegrationAdapter is started with a serverName, all the subFlows (or Runtime Ids) associated with the Server are started. All of these subFlows should belong to the same Transport Protocol (such as DB, or JMS).
The server identifier. This can be obtained by the getServerList api.
